wordGroup: the appalachian mountains 阿巴拉契亚山脉
appalachian trail 阿巴拉契亚山道；阿帕拉契山径

sentences.en: Most of the art exhibitions have a pronounced Appalachian theme.
sentences.cn: 大部分艺术展品都有一种明显的阿巴拉契亚主题。

sentences.en: During spring, it is common for small towns in the Appalachian area to hold large ramp dinners for the community.
sentences.cn: 在春天，阿巴拉契亚地区的小城镇为社区举办大型斜坡晚宴是很常见的。

sentences.en: Two geologists discovered that about half of the sand from the Grand Canyon was actually once part of the Appalachian Mountains.
sentences.cn: 两位地质学家发现，约半数的来自大峡谷的沙子实际上曾经是阿巴拉契亚山脉的一部分。
